functions.name: Dispensing Flag
functions.description: Displayed when CMWS is dispensing countermeasures.

functions.name: Threat Direction Front Left
functions.description: Displayed when there is a threat front and left.

functions.name: Threat Direction Front Right
functions.description: Displayed when there is a threat front and right.

functions.name: Threat Direction Aft Left
functions.description: Displayed when there is a threat rear and left.

functions.name: Threat Direction Aft Right
functions.description: Displayed when there is a threat rear and right.

functions.name: Threat Zone Front
functions.description: Displayed when both front detectors are active.

functions.name: Threat Zone Left
functions.description: Displayed when both left detectors are active.

functions.name: Threat Zone Aft
functions.description: Displayed when both rear detectors are active.

functions.name: Threat Zone Right
functions.description: Displayed when both right detectors are active.

functions.name: vertical velocity
functions.description: Current vertical velocity of the aircraft.

functions.name: indicated airspeed
functions.description: Current indicated air speed of the aircraft.

functions.name: angle of attack
functions.description: Current angle of attack for the aircraft.

functions.name: radar altitude
functions.description: Current radar altitude of the aircraft.

functions.name: Altitude
functions.description: Barometric altitude above sea level of the aircraft.

functions.name: Pitch
functions.description: Current pitch displayed on the SAI.

functions.name: Bank
functions.description: Current bank displayed on the SAI.

functions.name: Warning Flag
functions.description: Displayed when SAI is caged or non-functional.

functions.name: Slip Ball
functions.description: Current position of the slip ball relative to the center of the tube.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) -1 is full left and 1 is full right.

functions.name: IAS Airspeed
functions.description: Current indicated air speed of the aircraft.
